Body:
DataFile = ['Data/camea2018n000136.hdf', 'Data/camea2018n000137.hdf']
dataset = DataSet(DataFile)
dataset[0].scanParameters = ['Ei']
import matplotlib
matplotlib.use('Agg')
try:
    dataset.plotRaw1D()
    assert False
except AttributeError:
    assert True
DataFile = ['Data/camea2018n000137.hdf', 'Data/camea2018n000137.hdf']
dataset = DataSet(DataFile)
try:
    dataset.plotRaw1D(analyzerSelection=[0])
    assert False
except AttributeError:
    assert True
try:
    dataset.plotRaw1D(detectorSelection=[0])
    assert False
except AttributeError:
    assert True
try:
    dataset.plotRaw1D(legend=[0])
    assert False
except AttributeError:
    assert True
